scripts.stage:deploy-user-app: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run stage:deploy
scripts.production:deploy-user-app: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run production:deploy
scripts.stage:deploy-data-service: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run stage:deploy
scripts.production:deploy-data-service: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run production:deploy
